item.title: [Python] Language processing 100 knock 2020 first chapter
item.description: [Language processing 100 knocks 2020 version](https://nlp100.github.io/ja/) has been published, so I will solve it at this opportunity. It’s a copy of my own jupyter notebook in markdown, so the explanation is less. I hope that it will be a little reference, and I also posted to Qiita what I plan to put together on a blog and GitHub. I don’t like the teachers who can provide such wonderful teaching materials.
